title: Poses for Artists Volume 6 - Various Male & Female Poses: An Essential Reference for Figure Drawing and the Human Form
description: Volume six includes over 200 new poses! Most of these poses have never been made available to the public, while others were put online for free over the past two years. You'll see new male and female figures in many positions, some with swords, bows, hatchets, staffs, knives and orbs. Explore these organized poses to help spark your imagination!
author: Justin R. Martin
